snippet: The Walmart division says the survey, done with Gallup, will be the first of a quarterly series on the nation’s smallest businesses.
abstract: Sam's Club, in partnership with Gallup, releases first of ongoing quarterly surveys on the country’s smallest businesses, part of company's core customer base; results highlight rise in microbusinesses owned by women, which represent more than 45 percent of the newer businesses in this sector.
lead_paragraph: The Walmart division says the survey, done with Gallup, will be the first of a quarterly series on the nation’s smallest businesses.

headline.print_headline: Sam’s Club Joins With Gallup to Survey Smallest Businesses
